metadata.title: USN-5056-1 -- APR vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that APR incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5056-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapr1 - 1.5.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libapr1-dev - 1.5.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
